    #include<iostream>
    using namespace std;
    #include<stdio.h>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include<vector>
    #include<queue>
    #include<utility>
    #include<stack>
    #include<map>
    #include<set>
    #include<string.h>
    #include<math.h>
    #define MOD 1000000007
    #define MIN -100000000
    #define MAX 100000000
    #define ll long long int
    template<class T>T gcd(T a,T b){return (b==0)?a:gcd(b,a%b);}
    template<class T>T lcm(T a,T b){return (a*b)/gcd(a,b);}
    template<class T>T powmod(T a,T b,T mod) {T res=1;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;for(;b;b>>=1){if(b&1)res=res*a;if(res>=mod)res%=mod;a=a*a;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;}return res;}
     
    /* HOPE n WILL :)
    	NGU :)
    	_/\_ 	*/
    // MG
     
    int paruf[2005];
    int rankuf[2005];
     
    void init(int n)
    {
    	int i;
    	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    	{
    		paruf[i]=i;
    		rankuf[i]=1;
    	}
    }
    int find(int x)
    {
    	if(paruf[x]==x)
    	return x;
    	else return paruf[x]=find(paruf[x]);
    }
     
    void uni(int x,int y)
    {
    	int xroot=find(x);
    	int yroot=find(y);
    	
    	if(xroot==yroot)
    	return;
    	
    	if(rankuf[xroot]<rankuf[yroot])
    	{
    		paruf[xroot]=yroot;
    		rankuf[yroot]+=rankuf[xroot];
    	}
    	else
    	{
    		paruf[yroot]=xroot;
    		rankuf[xroot]+=rankuf[yroot];
    	}
    }
    map<double, pair<int,int> > ma;
    int main()
    {
    	int n,i,t,m,l,r,l1,r1,m1,k,x,y,j;
    	ll ans;
    	double x1,l2,r2;
    	scanf("%d",&t);
    	while(t--)
    	{
    		ma.clear();
    		scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
    		m1=m;
    		init(n);
    		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
    		{
    			scanf("%d %d",&l,&r);
    			l2=l*1.0;
    			r2=r*1.0;
    			x1=(l2+r2)/2.0;
    			if(ma[x1].first==0)
    			{
    				ma[x1].first=l;
    				ma[x1].second=r;
    				continue;
    			}
    			l1=ma[x1].first;
    			r1=ma[x1].second;
    			if((r1-l1)<(r-l))
    			{
    				ma[x1].first=l;
    				ma[x1].second=r;
    			}
    		}
    		map<double, pair<int,int> > ::iterator it;		
    		for(it=ma.begin();it!=ma.end();it++)
    		{
    			x=(*it).second.first;
    			y=k=(*it).second.second;
    			for(j=x;j<=(x+y)/2;j++)
    			{
    				uni(j,k);
    				k--;	
    			}
    		}
    		ll c=0;
    		ll t1=26;
    		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    		{
    			if(find(i)==i)
    			c++;
    		}
    		//cout<<"c : "<<c<<"\n";
    		ll mod=MOD;
    		ans=(powmod(t1,c,mod))%MOD;
    		printf("%lld\n",ans);
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
